raw_comment: I notice that there legacy students are more likely to be accepted especially if there parents' income is higher. I wonder if legacy has more affect on the chance of being accepted compared to parents  income. This relates to me and my community because in a few years I will be going to college. Headline: Effect legacy has on acceptance rate
ace_sentences: I notice that legacy students are more likely to be accepted.
If the income of the parents of a legacy student is higher, then the legacy student is especially likely to be accepted.
I wonder if legacy has more effect on the chance of being accepted than the income of parents has.
This issue relates to my community.
In a few years, I will go to college.
The headline is: Effect legacy has on acceptance rate.
